About Me

Thanks for stopping in! I'm Lucas. A Level 2 mortgage agent with Martel Mortgages that wants to make sure all your questions are answered, with the end goal of getting your mortgage funded.  I want your business and I want YOU to feel like YOU have received personal service from start to finish. ​​
